info.name: Trello classic label colours
info.description: Atlassian changed the classic Trello label colours in 2023. This style restores them to the cheerful and bright, pre-2023 palette.
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.3.1 2023-11-05.

// Updated as Trello changed label from button to span element.

Tested on Google Chrome (Official Build) (64-bit) and Mozilla Firefox (64-bit).
